wikipedia_page.main: David Cork (born 28 October 1962) is an English former professional footballer who made 200 appearances in the Football League for Arsenal, Huddersfield Town, West Bromwich Albion, Scunthorpe United and Darlington in the 1980s and early 1990s. He played as a forward or midfielder.

response: *David Cork (footballer, born 1959), English former footballer who played as a midfielder for Doncaster Rovers and Sydney Olympic
